title: WAY BETTER VERSION OF ZUNE THEME - Zune-Usmanistan Theme
description:
[b][This theme has about 30 000 downloads within a month from  just one site]

For Screens Checkout: 
 <a href="
http://customize.org/xpthemes/57013[/b]" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://customize.org/xpthemes/57013[/b]</a>

~=~=~=~

I really liked the Zune Theme. It was that classic XP feel, with an added touch of elegance. Only, I really disliked that ugly orange. I&#039;m sorry to all of those energetic, bold people who love to wear orange, but I&#039;m a bit more of a &#039;chill&#039; kind of guy. I like nice calm colours [Canadian spelling] that are soothing.

The Zune-Usmanistan Theme is like an extended version of the original MS Zune Theme. You can change that distasteful orange to many colours that I have chosen, under the &#039;Colour Scheme&#039; menu on the &#039;Appearance&#039; tab, in &#039;Display Properties&#039;.

Admittedly, I made this theme in about 5 minutes, using StyleBuilder which I just started using for the first time yesterday. And I&#039;m sure there are some amazing computer graphic artists who are probably hysterically laughing at the &#039;Download&#039; button for my theme, as in comparison to their themes, is very primitive. But I think there will be some people out there who will really appreciate this theme.

It really does look nice!

Anyhoo, I invite you to make any suggestions, comments, and the bluntest of criticisms, as without them I will have no reason to change the theme.

Well, that&#039;s it. Here is my first theme upload ever.

Enjoy!
